The atmosphere of the place is wonderful, especially if you love Latin music. It has wonderful vibes and you can dance something I can relate to as I‚Äôm Latin and grew up with an ambiance like that. Now, as a restaurant the service is horrible. No attention to your basic details which is what I expect I don‚Äôt need a Michelin star service but the basic like hi how are you can I suggest this, this is the special instead of I don‚Äôt know, what do you want. Beware of this pink sauce it‚Äôs extremely spicy even for a person like myself who enjoys spicy food that sauce is inedible. I wish my waitress the lady with green eyes would of answered my question instead of brushing it off. I was excited to eat and put the hot sauce my whole experience ruining. The food looks like your average Latin cuisine I couldn‚Äôt tell you how it taste I couldn‚Äôt eat mine. The wait time is long which makes sense they can get busy so I would suggest an appetizer to share with your friends&family. If you pay cash you get a discount another thing to be aware of. The gratitude is including which for me is fine I‚Äôll do my part but, this is the first time where I hesitated to pay for it I was disgusted with the treatment from my waitress, the only person that saved it was a charismatic I believe Colombian waiter I wish I remembered his name but I believe it was Andres. He is knowledgeable about his craft more than I expect and again I just expect the basic. First time eating here and I wouldn‚Äôt come back the service is horrible from all except for one waiter, not even for the ambiance at that point I would just go to the club.

Me encanta ese lugar , los platos son deliciosos el
Ambiente es muy agradable , la atenci√≥n es excelente l√°stima que no sea de todo el personal , hay un chico que  nos encanta como nos atiende creo que su nombre es Andr√©s , que persona tan aut√©ntica parece el Due√±o del negocio siempre est√° preocupado por todo y nuestro mayor motivo de seguir frecuentando se debe a las experiencias que nos hace pasar  , recomendar√© ese lugar siempre el Encebollado delicioso me encant√≥ la recomendaci√≥n que nos Hizo del Churrasco colombiano amo ese lugar gracias üôè
Muy recomendable este lugar deliciosa comida y la atenci√≥n  excelente muy rico todo gracias por su excelente servicio

Mal√≠sima la experiencia. No gasten su dinero solo por escuchar m√∫sica. Fui el d√≠a domingo, desde que llegu√© con mi esposo no nos prestaron atenci√≥n para saber d√≥nde sentarnos, pedimos yuca frita, arroz con menestra y carne y ceviche de camar√≥n. Pedimos tambi√©n unos jugos, que por cierto se equivoc√≥ en el sabor que le ped√≠ pero le dej√© pasar, despu√©s de una hora esperar por la comida e ignorarnos los meseros, llega a decirnos que no hay la yuca, el ceviche estaba raro, una textura rara el camar√≥n chicloso y el arroz con menestra parec√≠a frijoles de lata. Que pena que hagan quedar mal la gastronom√≠a de Ecuador.

El ambiente muy agradable la primera ves que voy fuimos mi esposo y mi hijo la comida rica est√°bamos tomando margarita y mojitos  cuando se acerc√≥ una mesera  con asent√≥ colombiano y nos dijo tienen dos horas ya es suficiente tomen este es la cuenta el lugar est√° reservado omg que coraje cuando llegamos nos dijeron pasen hay m√∫sica en vivo  lleg√≥ la cuenta 160 pagamos y nos retiramos pero muy grosera la mesera el √∫nico agradable un mesero colombiano muy agradable eso no se hace si dicen esto est√° reservado solo hasta tal hora pueden estar no entramos pero como ya  hab√≠amos comido  consumido nos dijeron lo de la reserva

A friend recommended Panorama when I was looking for a place for my mom‚Äôs 80th birthday celebration after being ghosted by another vendor. I went in person to speak to the manager and try to food. The manager was very friendly and accommodating. She even gave me her personal cell to answer any questions we had. We decided to book it after seeing the beautiful space in person and trying to food which was amazing, highly recommend the ceviche de camar√≥n. Our waitress Karen, the bartender and DJ went above and beyond to help make sure everything was taken care of and that everyone had a great time. Thank you to the wonderful staff at Panorama for help making my mom‚Äôs party a night to remember!

Que comida m√°s deliciosaaa, me ped√≠ este pargo a la marinara y estaba incre√≠blemente rico y generoso con el mix de seafood que tra√≠a la salsa a parte de que mi pedido lleg√≥ s√∫per r√°pido y calentito.
Todo muy bien empacado con lim√≥n para acompa√±ar el pescado y con salsa picante deliciosa, muchas gracias a las chicas por la atenci√≥n y los chefs que siempre se lucen con el sabor. Amo Panorama.‚ù§Ô∏è

Mi esposo y yo estamos encantados de haber realizado la recepci√≥n por la confirmaci√≥n de mi hijo con Panorama Restaurant, el ambiente, el servicio y la comida deliciosa. Recomendado excelente todo.

Food and service was great until it was time to pay. Originally the server said my daughters strawberry milk shake was on the house but they charged it to our bill, no big deal. The portions were big so we asked to take home the left overs. They added $2 per each ToGo tray (small round plastic containers that only fit small sides) if you want to take home left overs which I've never heard of in any other restaurant. They also automatically added a 18% gratuity for party of 2 adults, one toddler and one infant.

The place looks decent but was very empty. Not sure if I'd go back due to the sneaky fees they add without telling you.

Great food, great service, and lots of fun. Everyone was very attentive and friendly. There was no long delay in getting our food. They have authentic Ecuadorian food as well as Colombian style dishes. I ordered the seafood Ceviche it was‚Ä¶
Me gusto la comida exelente
Primera vez que visito y el servicio fue excelente. Volveremos pronto!!!

Just to be clear, this review is fully my experience with no hateful or negative feelings toward the restaurant. I called for delivery, and the lady raking my order clearly did not understand my order, I had to repeat it to her three times. I ordered the "Pollo salteado", which is the one in the picture. That Pollo Salteado was clearly not even close to what it was supposed to be. They were not pieces but chunks of chicken with veins that make it uncomfortable to chew. Worse part of all, the sauce had SOOO MUCH OIL in it, not a sauce at all. Good thing they gave me the rice separately because I don't know how I would've handled it. I haven't tried their other food, but the prices don't convince me, especially with this first time experience
The food was so delicious and the place nice clean and the staff very nice and they make a good job
Loved it! Really good ecuadorian food!
Gran ambiente, disfrute con mis colegas y la comida estaba riquisima!! Gracias por toda la atenci√≥n. Andr√©s fue un gran camarero!!
El lugar es agradable, el servicio es bueno, la chicas sobre todo, se esmeran por dar un buen servicio.
Best encebollado spot u can ever find in queens! üòã great service and everything!

It took an hour to get our food while everyone else received their food and they were there after us.  The waitress wasn't attentive in the beginning not until we were getting ready to leave. Persuaded us to stay and apologized. The owner was there but she did not apologize to us at all. Food was good but service could definitely be better.

The food was very good and tasty.  Brought home ceviche to try out as well.

Update on the fish ceviche; not so hot. I think they might be boiling the fish too long and put it in the lemon but is mushy.

I still will go back for their other foods.

A family member found this venue when my partner and I were looking for place to throw our baby shower. Their main venue fit our needs the best and the price was great which included a lot of features. Couldn‚Äôt be happier with how everything turned out. The venue is clean, the staff was so helpful and worked with us in answering any inquiries we had, from the menu, to the bartender and DJ, etc. Loved that they were accommodating when it came to how we wanted to decorate the venue. They didn‚Äôt limit us in any capacity. Just make sure you get a contact number when booking the venue. What we did is, dropped by the venue a month in advance and coordinated minor details. Thank you Panorama staff.
